author: Daisy Maxey
title: Putnam Takes the Number Targets Out of Fund Names
text:
Putnam Investments is paring its lineup of absolute-return mutual funds and renaming them to remove references to ambitious performance goalsâ€”targets they largely failed to meet.
Putnam will cut its absolute-return fund lineup to two funds from four, with most of the changes expected to take effect in late April.
Absolute-return funds generally...
